FILE(GLOB_RECURSE LUABIND_SOURCES *.cpp)
FILE(GLOB_RECURSE LUABIND_HEADERS *.hpp)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../lua)

ADD_LIBRARY(ankiluabind ${LUABIND_SOURCES} ${LUABIND_HEADERS})
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(ankiluabind PROPERTIES LINKER_LANGUAGE CXX)
